title: Meta disbands custom AR/VR OS team after denying report it would disband AR/VR OS team
content:
Ahead of the rumored Apple headset debut, Meta has a change of plans for their own AR/VR devices. After many roadblocks, Facebook’s parent company has scrapped the idea of making its own operating system from scratch. 

more…

The post Meta disbands custom AR/VR OS team after denying report it would disband AR/VR OS team appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Ahead of the Apple headset debut, Meta has a change of plans for their AR/VR devices and scrapped the idea of making its own OS from scratch.
